WARNING: This file is NOT where your settings are stored.
This file is only used to display the settings in the game.
The file you are looking for is 'settings.txt' in your saves folder.
If you want to change your settings, edit that file instead.

disasters: This may result in up to 1/3rd of your Clan dying in one cycle.
showxp: Show exact XP and nutrition status
Will turn 'experience: proficient' into 'experience: proficient (151)'; and 'nutrition: full' into 'nutrition: full (70)'.
random med cat: Allow clerics to be randomly selected on patrol
Clerics can be selected with the patrol buttons +1, +3,+6.
fading: Allow dead slugcats to fade away
After 202 cycles, dead slugcats will be unloaded, and saved separately. No family relations will be lost.
save_faded_copy: Save a complete copy of faded slugcats information
A complete copy of faded slugcat save info will be saved in plain-text.
backgrounds: Even with this off, the camp you choose will still affect the events you encounter.
moons and seasons: Displays Clan age and current Clan season on several pages.
all accessories: All slugcats have access to all accessories in the game. Warning: this is irreversible!

deputy: Allow leaders to automatically choose a new deputy
The Warrior Code rules will be taken into account when choosing a deputy.
12_moon_graduation: All apprentices will graduate at 12 cycles.
retirement: Slugcats will never retire due to a permanent condition
When this setting is off, slugcats with permanent conditions will choose whether or not they want to retire.
become_mediator: Allow warriors and elders to choose to become mediators
Warriors and elders will have a chance to become mediators upon timeskip.

affair: Allow slugcats to breed with slugcats that aren't their mates
This will allow mated and unmated slugcats to have pups with other slugcats they are not mated with. This includes, but is not limited to, affairs/cheating.
same sex birth: Allow all slugcats to get pregnant despite their gender and all couples to birth slugpups despite same-sex status.
same sex adoption: If same-sex birth is disabled, this option greatly increases the chances of same-sex couples adopting.
single parentage: Allow slugcats to have slugpups with an unknown second parent
Allow slugcats to have slugpups with an unknown second biological parent. The slugcat will be listed as the only biological parent.
romantic with former mentor: Allow romantic interactions with former mentors
Allows mentors and the slugcats they trained to be romantic after they become warriors.
first cousin mates: Allow first cousins to be mates and have romantic interactions
Allows slugcats with the same grandparents but different parents to become mates.

by-status: The Clan will be fed according their status and within the status by age.
younger first: The Clan will be fed according to their age only.
less nutrition first: First the slugcats with the lowest nutrition will be fed, afterwards the Clan will be fed according to their status.
hunter first: Firstly the slugcats with a hunter skill will be fed, afterwards the Clan will be fed according to their status.
sick/injured first: Firstly the sick and injured slugcats will be fed, afterwards the Clan will be fed according to their status.
more experience first: The Clan will be fed according their experience, highest one first.
ration prey: Healthy warriors will only eat half of the food they need, even if there is enough for the Clan.

business as usual: The Clan has no specific focus and won't get any bonuses.
hunting: The Clan will focus on hunting, each working warrior (including deputy and leader) and each working apprentice will gather additional prey on each timeskip.
herb gathering: The Clan will focus on herb gathering, each cleric and cleric apprentice will gather additional herbs on each timeskip due to extra help from the warriors.
threaten outsiders: The relationship with slugcats outside of the Clan decreases due to intentionally threatening behavior from your warriors.
seek outsiders: The relationship with slugcats outside of the Clan increases as your warriors make efforts to sow seeds of friendship.
rest and recover: The Clan will take more care and time in their tasks and therefore the rate of injuries, illnesses and outbreaks will be reduced.
sabotage other clans: Your mediator and warriors work together to undermine the other Clans. Only available if you have a working mediator. Selecting this will also allow you to choose which Clans you target.
aid other clans: Your mediator and warriors work together to help the other Clans with whatever they need. Only available if you have a working mediator. Selecting this will also allow you to choose which Clans you target.
raid other clans: Your warriors begin crossing borders for resources. Prey and herbs will greatly increase each timeskip, but injuries and illnesses will increase and the relationship with other Clans decrease. You will be able to choose which Clans you target.
hoarding: Your warriors begin stockpiling as many resources as they can get their paws on, regardless of their own safety. Prey and herbs will increase each timeskip, but injuries and illnesses will also increase.
